Title: Be a trailblazer in the fight against selfishness, be a pathbreaker in the criticism of revisionism
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: The man is writing a Mao quotation: 'Take "Fight selfishness, repudiate revisionism" as key link' (认“斗私批修”为纲). In the background are the main characters from the "Three Constantly Read Articles" (老三篇): Norman Bethune, Zhang Side and Yu Gong, the "Foolish Old Man Who Removed the Mountains".
